mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gongzi ORDER BY regdate DESC

SELECT gseq, title, content, image, regdate, count FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY regdate DESC) rn, gseq, title, content, image, regdate, count FROM gongzi WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%') WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gongzi WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gongzi(gseq, title, content, image) VALUES(gongzi_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE gongzi SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, image=#{image} WHERE gseq=#{gseq}
